title: 表示删了些MOD出现了错误
author: TNT娘
txt_content:
Forge Mod Loader has found a problem with your minecarft installation
       The mods and versions listed below could not be found
                         bspkrsCore:any
   The file 'ForgeModloader-client-0.log'contains more information

replies.author: 拘束
replies.txt_content:
骚年搓板= =
还有你安了什么mod，删了什么mod都发出来

replies.author: linzhan
replies.txt_content: 你似乎把一个叫 bspkrsCore的mod删了，这似乎是一个mod的必要文件..........

replies.author: hine
replies.txt_content: 如果你装了砍树或耐久数显或者buff hud，删了bskprscore就会这样
